Detailed Description

Base class for file visitors.

Class FileVisitor implements an operation which shall be executed for all or certain filtered files in a directory. An instance of class File can accept a file visitor and in case the file is a directory it accepts the visitor and calls its method Visit() on every file gathered using a directory iterator initialized with the filter defined in the file visitor. This implements the visitor pattern.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FileVisitor::~FileVisitor (   )  [virtual]
 

Destroys the file visitor.

FileVisitor::FileVisitor (  const FileFilterPtr &  filter,
BOOLEAN  visit_directories = FALSE
)  [protected]
 

Constructs a file visitor. The filter is used to initialize the directory iterator which shall be used and the last argument defines if subdirectories themselves are visited, too.

Parameters:
filter The filter functor used to initialize the directory iterator.
visit_directories Tells if subdirectories themselves are visited.

Member Function Documentation

FileFilterPtr FileVisitor::GetIteratorFilter (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the filter functor for intializing the iterator to be used.

virtual BOOLEAN FileVisitor::Visit (  const Path &  file  )  [pure virtual]
 

Visits file and performs its operation on it. The return value indicates if the visiting shall continue or shall be aborted.

BOOLEAN FileVisitor::VisitDirectories (   )  const [inline]
 

Tells if directories themselves shall be visited, i.e. if method Visit() shall be called also on directories or only on files.

Field Documentation

The client provided filter for selecting the files to iterate on.
